Html:
even with tutorial 8, I only get 15-16 fps. what do you think the issue would be? is it normal

i have hp dv6, 6 gig ram, AMD Phenom II N950 Quad Core 2.10GHZ, ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5650 1Gb, windows7-64bit

Hmm... that's strange. It seems like you have a decent machine. It should run above 30 FPS. Is your camera constantly changing exposure? If you have an auto-exposure for your camera, that slows down the application. Also, you may want to turn off shadow and per-pixel-shading to see how much improvement you get.

Ohan
